H0.text: Of which country is Manama the capital. Qatar

H1.text: Of which country is Manama the capital. Oman

H2.text: Of which country is Manama the capital. United Arab Emirates

H3.text: Of which country is Manama the capital. Bahrein

A4.text: The capital and largest city is Manama.

A5.text: Bahrain, officially the Kingdom of Bahrain, is an island country in West Asia.
